data.introduce: 国际退改签规则查询服务是国际shopping服务的后继服务，为客户提供退改签规则查询。
data.business: 国际退改签规则查询服务是国际shopping服务的后继服务，所需的查询条件来源于国际shopping查询服务返回的结果或者国际运价计算Pricing服务返回的结果。
data.functions:
1.支持CAT1~CAT50的全部规则英文文本展示
2.与黑屏显示的规则完全一致，包括格式及内容。
3.支持CAT16规则的自动中文化翻译。
4. 支持查询航路限制
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TSK_AirfarePriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Request","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"UserInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"UserType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"用户类型，如1E，Airline","children":[]},{"name":"UserCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"用户代码，如CZ","children":[]},{"name":"ChannelId","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"渠道，如B2C，B2B，CRS，ICS","children":[]}]},{"name":"RequestTime","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"不存在时为当前时间","children":[]},{"name":"Token","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"不存在时由系统计算该值","children":[]},{"name":"SITA_AirfareRulesRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The Rules transaction returns rules text for the specified fare. In addition to
                the OTA transaction the requestor may pass in the Cookie references returned in a pricing
                response to match a specific fare.","children":[{"name":"OTA_AirRulesRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The Rules Request message requests text rules for a specific fare
                class code for an airline and city pair on a specific date. Optional information negotiated
                fare contract codes to be included in the message. The rules request contains similar to a
                Fare Rules entry on an airline CRS or GDS.","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point of Sale (POS) is
                the details identifying the party or connection channel making the
                request.","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"0..5","default":"","description":"Provides information on
                the source of a request.","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"An identifier used to
                uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline
                reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking
                confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability
                quote).","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Identifies a company by
                name.","children":[{"name":"CompanyID_AttributesGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides meaning to a
                company code.","children":[{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"@TravelSector","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"UniqueID_Group","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides unique
                identification information.","children":[{"name":"@URL","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"URL that identifies the
                    location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Instance","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"ID_Group","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used to provide a
                required unique identifier.","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Position","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Used to identify
                geospatial postion of the requesting entity.","children":[{"name":"PositionGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used to specify the
                geographic coordinates of a location.","children":[{"name":"@Latitude","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@Longitude","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@Altitude","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingChannel","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies the booking
                        channel type and whether it is the primary means of connectivity
                        of the source.","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Identifies a company by
                name.","children":[{"name":"CompanyID_AttributesGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides meaning to a
                company code.","children":[{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"@TravelSector","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"@AgentSine","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@ISOCountry","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"2 character country code as defined in ISO3166.","children":[]},{"name":"@ISOCurrency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@AgentDutyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@AirlineVendorID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for an Upper Alpha String and Numeric, length 2 to 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@AirportCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for an Upper Alpha String and Numeric, length 3 to 5.","children":[]},{"name":"@FirstDepartPoint","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@ERSP_UserID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@TerminalID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RuleReqInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The Rule Request Information required to return all
                            applicable fare rule categories.","children":[{"name":"RuleInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Contains summary fare
                rule information as well as detailed Rule Information for Fare Basis
                Codes. Information may be actual rules data or the results returned
                from a rules-based inquiry.","children":[{"name":"ResTicketingRules","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"General container for
                        rules regarding fare reservation, ticketing and sale restrictions","children":[{"name":"AdvResTicketing","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Container used to hold
                information regarding advance reservation and/or advance ticketing.","children":[{"name":"AdvReservation","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies constraints
                        on when advance reservations can be made.","children":[{"name":"@LatestTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@LatestPeriod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric Strings, minimum length 1, maximum length 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@LatestUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]}]},{"name":"AdvTicketing","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies advance
                        ticketing restrictions.","children":[{"name":"@FromResTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromResPeriod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric Strings, minimum length 1, maximum length 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromResUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromDepartTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromDepartPeriod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric Strings, minimum length 1, maximum length 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromDepartUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]}]},{"name":"@AdvResInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator for
                    identifying whether or not advance reservation restrictions are
                    involved in the request or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@AdvTicketingInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator for
                    identifying whether or not advance ticketing restrictions are
                    involved in the request or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@RequestedTicketingDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"A construct to validate either a date or a dateTime value.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"LengthOfStayRules","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Type defining Min and Max
                Stay Restrictions","children":[{"name":"MinimumStay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Specifies restrictions
                        for the shortest length/period of time or earliest day return
                        travel can commence or be completed.","children":[{"name":"@ReturnTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@MinStay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric values, from 1 to 99 inclusive","children":[]},{"name":"@StayUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]},{"name":"@MinStayDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]}]},{"name":"MaximumStay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Specifies restrictions
                        for the longest length/period of time or last day to begin or
                        complete the return.","children":[{"name":"@ReturnType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Code indicating
                                whether travel must commence or be completed in order to satisfy
                                the stay restriction.","children":[]},{"name":"@ReturnTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@MaxStay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric values, from 1 to 99 inclusive","children":[]},{"name":"@StayUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]},{"name":"@MaxStayDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]}]},{"name":"@StayRestrictionsInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"True indicates that Stay
                    Restrictions exist.","children":[]}]},{"name":"ChargesRules","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"General container for
                        rules specifying amounts for such things as: surcharges, deposits,
                        change penalties, cancellation penalties, etc.","children":[{"name":"VoluntaryChanges","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies charges and/or
                penalties associated with making ticket changes after purchase.","children":[{"name":"Penalty","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies penalty
                        charges as either a currency amount or a percentage of the fare","children":[{"name":"@PenaltyType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the type
                                of penalty involved in the search or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifier used to
                                indicate whether the change occurs before or after departure
                                from the origin city.","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyAmountGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a monetary
                amount and the currency code to reflect the currency in which this
                amount is expressed.","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3 decimals","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyCodeGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a currency code
                to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.","children":[{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@DecimalPlaces","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the number of
                    decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the
                    ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount
                    provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal
                    point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for percentage values","children":[]}]},{"name":"@VolChangeInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator used to
                    specify whether voluntary change and other penalties are involved
                    in the search or response.","children":[]}]},{"name":"VoluntaryRefunds","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies charges and/or
                penalties associated with making ticket changes after purchase.","children":[{"name":"Penalty","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies penalty
                        charges as either a currency amount or a percentage of the fare","children":[{"name":"@PenaltyType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the type
                                of penalty involved in the search or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifier used to
                                indicate whether the change occurs before or after departure
                                from the origin city.","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyAmountGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a monetary
                amount and the currency code to reflect the currency in which this
                amount is expressed.","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3 decimals","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyCodeGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a currency code
                to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.","children":[{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@DecimalPlaces","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the number of
                    decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the
                    ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount
                    provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal
                    point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for percentage values","children":[]}]},{"name":"@VolChangeInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator used to
                    specify whether voluntary change and other penalties are involved
                    in the search or response.","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"SubSection","type":"array","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@SubTitle","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"@SubCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@SubSectionNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 8","children":[]}]},{"name":"@LanguageRequested","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alpha-Numeric Strings, length 1 to 8","children":[]},{"name":"@AbbreviatedRuleTextInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"When true, the abbreviated rule text
                                            should be returned, not the full rule text.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AdditionalRulesRQData","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"TSK_Extensions","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RequestType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求类型: 0-不需要回传原始请求文本 1-需要回传原始请求文本 2-需要回传简化英文 ,缺省为0","children":[]},{"name":"ResultType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"返回结果的类型: 0-返回完整结果 1-返回部分结果,缺省为0","children":[]},{"name":"DestLang","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"翻译后语言类型: EN-英文 CN-中文 KR-韩文 等 ,缺省为CN","children":[]},{"name":"AirLine","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司,如 CA","children":[]},{"name":"CatType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"规则类型,如16(表示cat16), 6(表示cat6), 7(表示cat7)","children":[]},{"name":"RequestRule","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"待翻译的完整文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@DatabaseAccessDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the layer of historic data to be used for this transaction.
                        Not normally used and may not be available in production. Useful for ensuring that
                        responses to transactions give a consistent result for testing purposes.","children":[]}]},{"name":"RuleTranslation","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RTRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RequestType","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求类型: 0-不需要回传原始请求文本 1-需要回传原始请求文本 2-需要回传简化英文 ,缺省为0","children":[]},{"name":"ResultType","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"返回结果的类型: 0-返回完整结果 1-返回部分结果,缺省为0","children":[]},{"name":"OriginLang","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"翻译前语言类型: EN-英文 CN-中文 KR-韩文 等 ,缺省为EN","children":[]},{"name":"DestLang","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"翻译后语言类型: EN-英文 CN-中文 KR-韩文 等 ,缺省为CN","children":[]},{"name":"AirLine","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司,如 CA","children":[]},{"name":"RequestAbstract","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"待翻译的摘要文本","children":[]},{"name":"CatType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则类型,如16(表示cat16), 6(表示cat6), 7(表示cat7)","children":[]},{"name":"SequenceNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求编号,由发起请求者填写,返回结果里会返回该编号,以区分各个请求,必填","children":[]},{"name":"RequestAll","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"待翻译的完整文本","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"@MinGroupFareInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否使用小团价出票","children":[]},{"name":"TSK_Extention","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"此节点为空则只返回英文
规则，新增加的中文规则翻
译节点，老接口无。","children":[{"name":"ResultType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"返回中文规则类型：
0- 返回完整结果；
1- 返回 简化 结果 ；
2- 有完整翻译则返回完整
翻译 ，否则返回简化翻译；
3- 有简化翻译则返回简化
翻译，否则返回完整翻译 ，
依据翻译的内容存放在后台
的形式填写，缺省为 0。","children":[]},{"name":"AirLine","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码，查询中文规
则时必须填写。","children":[]},{"name":"RequestType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求类型：0-不需要回传原
始请求文本； 1- 需要回传
原始请求文本； 2-需要回传
简化英文；缺省为 0。","children":[]},{"name":"DestLang","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"EN，为英文；缺省为 CN，","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema:
[{"name":"OTA_AirRulesRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The Rules Response message contains a set of text (human readable) rule information
                paragraphs. Each paragraph is identified by a rule code. This message contains similar
                information to a standard airline CRS or GDS Fare Rules Response message.","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Standard way to indicate
                successful processing of an OTA message. Returning an empty element
                of this type indicates success.","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Standard way to indicate successful processing of
                                an OTA message, but one in which warnings are generated.","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"Standard way to indicate
                successful processing of an OTA message, but one in which warnings
                are generated","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"ErrorWarningAttributeGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used to identify an
                application error by either text, code, or by an online description
                and also to give the status, tag, and/or identification of the
                record that may have caused the error.","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Content","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@DocURL","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"If present, this URL
                    refers to an online description of the error that occurred.","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@Tag","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"If present, this
                    attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an
                    error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use
                    XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that
                    more than one tag of the same name is present in the document.
                    Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing
                    data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].","children":[]},{"name":"@RecordID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"FareRuleResponseInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The collection of Fare Rule requests and the applicable Fare Rule
                categories.","children":[{"name":"FareRuleInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Rules for this priced
                option.","children":[{"name":"DepartureDate","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Departure Date for this
                        priced fare","children":[]},{"name":"FareReference","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used to provide the
                        fare basis code, the fare class code, and/or ticket designator.","children":[{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for an Alpha String, length 2 (for letter codes)","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketDesignatorCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]}]},{"name":"RuleInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Contains summary fare
                rule information as well as detailed Rule Information for Fare Basis
                Codes. Information may be actual rules data or the results returned
                from a rules-based inquiry.","children":[{"name":"ResTicketingRules","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"General container for
                        rules regarding fare reservation, ticketing and sale restrictions","children":[{"name":"AdvResTicketing","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Container used to hold
                information regarding advance reservation and/or advance ticketing.","children":[{"name":"AdvReservation","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies constraints
                        on when advance reservations can be made.","children":[{"name":"@LatestTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@LatestPeriod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric Strings, minimum length 1, maximum length 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@LatestUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]}]},{"name":"AdvTicketing","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies advance
                        ticketing restrictions.","children":[{"name":"@FromResTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromResPeriod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric Strings, minimum length 1, maximum length 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromResUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromDepartTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromDepartPeriod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric Strings, minimum length 1, maximum length 3.","children":[]},{"name":"@FromDepartUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]}]},{"name":"@AdvResInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator for
                    identifying whether or not advance reservation restrictions are
                    involved in the request or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@AdvTicketingInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator for
                    identifying whether or not advance ticketing restrictions are
                    involved in the request or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@RequestedTicketingDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"A construct to validate either a date or a dateTime value.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"LengthOfStayRules","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Type defining Min and Max
                Stay Restrictions","children":[{"name":"MinimumStay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Specifies restrictions
                        for the shortest length/period of time or earliest day return
                        travel can commence or be completed.","children":[{"name":"@ReturnTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@MinStay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric values, from 1 to 99 inclusive","children":[]},{"name":"@StayUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]},{"name":"@MinStayDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]}]},{"name":"MaximumStay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Specifies restrictions
                        for the longest length/period of time or last day to begin or
                        complete the return.","children":[{"name":"@ReturnType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Code indicating
                                whether travel must commence or be completed in order to satisfy
                                the stay restriction.","children":[]},{"name":"@ReturnTimeOfDay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]},{"name":"@MaxStay","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric values, from 1 to 99 inclusive","children":[]},{"name":"@StayUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Defines the 'Units' that
                can be applied to Stay restrictions.","children":[]},{"name":"@MaxStayDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Allows for the specification of a date time or just time.","children":[]}]},{"name":"@StayRestrictionsInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"True indicates that Stay
                    Restrictions exist.","children":[]}]},{"name":"ChargesRules","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"General container for
                        rules specifying amounts for such things as: surcharges, deposits,
                        change penalties, cancellation penalties, etc.","children":[{"name":"VoluntaryChanges","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies charges and/or
                penalties associated with making ticket changes after purchase.","children":[{"name":"Penalty","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies penalty
                        charges as either a currency amount or a percentage of the fare","children":[{"name":"@PenaltyType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the type
                                of penalty involved in the search or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifier used to
                                indicate whether the change occurs before or after departure
                                from the origin city.","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyAmountGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a monetary
                amount and the currency code to reflect the currency in which this
                amount is expressed.","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3 decimals","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyCodeGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a currency code
                to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.","children":[{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@DecimalPlaces","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the number of
                    decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the
                    ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount
                    provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal
                    point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for percentage values","children":[]}]},{"name":"@VolChangeInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator used to
                    specify whether voluntary change and other penalties are involved
                    in the search or response.","children":[]}]},{"name":"VoluntaryRefunds","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies charges and/or
                penalties associated with making ticket changes after purchase.","children":[{"name":"Penalty","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Specifies penalty
                        charges as either a currency amount or a percentage of the fare","children":[{"name":"@PenaltyType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the type
                                of penalty involved in the search or response.","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifier used to
                                indicate whether the change occurs before or after departure
                                from the origin city.","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyAmountGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a monetary
                amount and the currency code to reflect the currency in which this
                amount is expressed.","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3 decimals","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyCodeGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides a currency code
                to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.","children":[{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@DecimalPlaces","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the number of
                    decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the
                    ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount
                    provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal
                    point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for percentage values","children":[]}]},{"name":"@VolChangeInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator used to
                    specify whether voluntary change and other penalties are involved
                    in the search or response.","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"FilingAirline","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifies a company by
                name.","children":[{"name":"CompanyID_AttributesGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides meaning to a
                company code.","children":[{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"@TravelSector","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Identifies a company by
                name.","children":[{"name":"CompanyID_AttributesGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides meaning to a
                company code.","children":[{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"@TravelSector","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Code and optional string
                to describe a location point.","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 8","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"IATA","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Code and optional string
                to describe a location point.","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 8","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"IATA","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]},{"name":"NegotiatedFareAttributes","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Attribute collection
                providing private fare profile.","children":[{"name":"@NegotiatedFare","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicator to show if
                    this is a private fare.","children":[]},{"name":"@NegotiatedFareCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Code used to identify
                    the private fare.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareRules","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Collection of formatted
                text sub sections.","children":[{"name":"SubSection","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"Used to provide
                subsection formatted text information.","children":[{"name":"Paragraph","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"An indication of a new
                paragraph for a sub-section of a formatted text message.","children":[{"name":"Text","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Provides text and
                indicates whether it is formatted or not.","children":[{"name":"@Formatted","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Textual information,
                            which may be formatted as a line of information, or unformatted,
                            as a paragraph of text.","children":[]},{"name":"LanguageGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifies language.","children":[{"name":"@Language","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Language identification.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Image","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"URL","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"ListItem","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@ListItem","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Name","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@ParagraphNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"DateTimeStampGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Creation date time,
                Creator Id, last modification date time and last Modifier Id.","children":[{"name":"@CreateDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Time stamp of the
                    creation.","children":[]},{"name":"@CreatorID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]},{"name":"@LastModifyDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Time stamp of last
                    modification.","children":[]},{"name":"@LastModifierID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]},{"name":"LanguageGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Identifies language.","children":[{"name":"@Language","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Language identification.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@SubTitle","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@SubCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 8","children":[]},{"name":"@SubSectionNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Numeric values, from 1 to 999 inclusive.","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Title","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@Language","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TSK_Extensions","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ResultData","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"翻译结果","children":[]},{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"提示信息","children":[]},{"name":"RuleNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则编号","children":[]},{"name":"RequestData","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"回传的原始请求或简化英文","children":[]},{"name":"SequenceNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求编号","children":[]},{"name":"Status","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"RuleSimplifieds","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"拆分的规则","children":[{"name":"RuleSimplified","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Category","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则类型，可填MaxStay、MinStay、Penalties","children":[]},{"name":"Contents","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"规则具体内容","children":[{"name":"SubCategory","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"规则子名称。目前只有cat16使用，可填Cancel/Refund、Change、Noshow","children":[]},{"name":"Content","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"子规则具体内容","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"AdditionalRulesRSData","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Routing","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RoutingPaths","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RoutingPath","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航路限制","children":[]}]},{"name":"RoutingRestrictions","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"A collection of errors
                that occurred during the processing of a message.","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"Standard way to indicate
                that an error occurred during the processing of an OTA message","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"ErrorWarningAttributeGroup","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used to identify an
                application error by either text, code, or by an online description
                and also to give the status, tag, and/or identification of the
                record that may have caused the error.","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA code tables. Possible values of this
                pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.","children":[]},{"name":"@Content","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@DocURL","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"If present, this URL
                    refers to an online description of the error that occurred.","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 64","children":[]},{"name":"@Tag","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"If present, this
                    attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an
                    error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use
                    XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that
                    more than one tag of the same name is present in the document.
                    Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing
                    data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].","children":[]},{"name":"@RecordID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character Strings, length 1 to 32","children":[]}]},{"name":"@NodeList","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"An XPath expression
                            that selects all the nodes whose data caused this error. Further,
                            this expression should have an additional contraint which
                            contains the data of the node. This will provide the offending
                            data back to systems that cannot maintain the original message.","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -200 ","name":null,"msg":" service is unavailable ","msgZh":" 访问的服务不可用 "},{"code":" -201 ","name":null,"msg":" service is not supported ","msgZh":" 不支持的服务 "},{"code":" -202 ","name":null,"msg":" service permission denied ","msgZh":" 服务访问被拒绝 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -9999 ","name":null,"msg":" unknown error ","msgZh":" 未知错误 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" input error ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "},{"code":" -300 ","name":null,"msg":" auth failed ","msgZh":" 认证失败 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" office认证失败 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TSK_AirfarePrice>
	<Request>
		<SITA_AirfareRulesRQ Version="1.000">
			<ota:OTA_AirRulesRQ xmlns:ota="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" EchoToken="TravelSky_IBE_LINE" Target="Test">
				<ota:POS>
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="7" ID_Context="Airfare" ID="8Le0x-ee4wR-II49g-MsCDk"/>
					</ota:Source>
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="7" ID_Context="CRSCode" ID="1E"/>
					</ota:Source>
                    <!--AirportCode填写与shopping请求一致-->
					<ota:Source AirportCode="PEK"/>
                    <!--ID填写实际IATA号-->
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="13" ID_Context="IATA_Number" ID="10000035"/>
					</ota:Source>
                    <!--PseudoCityCode填写与shopping请求一致-->
					<ota:Source PseudoCityCode="PEK099"/>
				</ota:POS>
				<ota:RuleReqInfo>
                   <!-- DepartureDate填写方法：从shopping结果中的PriceAvailabilityBinds节点找到第1个价格对应的AvailJourneyBinding中的av编号0119，然后从编号为0119的AV信息中找到DepartureDateTime,注意Rule请求的DepartureDateTime的格式-->
					<ota:DepartureDate>2013-12-15T12:00:00</ota:DepartureDate>
                    <!-- FareReference填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取FareReferce-->
					<ota:FareReference>ZLO60BU</ota:FareReference>
					<ota:RuleInfo/>
                     <!-- FilingAirline填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取FilingAirline-->
					<ota:FilingAirline Code="MU"/>
                    <!-- DepartureAirport 填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取DepartureAirport -->
					<ota:DepartureAirport LocationCode="BJS" CodeContext="IATA"/>
                    <!-- ArrivalAirport 填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取ArrivalAirport -->
					<ota:ArrivalAirport LocationCode="FRA" CodeContext="IATA"/>
				</ota:RuleReqInfo>
			</ota:OTA_AirRulesRQ>
			<AdditionalRulesRQData>
				<References>
				<!-- Ref1和Ref2的填写方法：将shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中的Ref1和Ref2复制过来即可  -->	<Ref1>GEPY01(USER(BJS,'1E',<>,Y,DEPT(<>,<>),<>,<>,<>),PF2(Y,[(AGENCY(PEK099),IATANUM(<>),N)],[],[],[],N,<>),<>)</Ref1>
					<Ref2>004E321EHNADTN00010000300ATP8V</Ref2>
				</References>
			</AdditionalRulesRQData>
			<TSK_Extensions>
				<ResultType>1</ResultType>
			</TSK_Extensions>
		</SITA_AirfareRulesRQ>
	</Request>
</TSK_AirfarePrice>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TSK_AirfarePrice>
	<Request>
		<SITA_AirfareRulesRQ Version="1.000">
			<ota:OTA_AirRulesRQ xmlns:ota="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" EchoToken="TravelSky_IBE_LINE" Target="Test">
				<ota:POS>
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="7" ID_Context="Airfare" ID="8Le0x-ee4wR-II49g-MsCDk"/>
					</ota:Source>
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="7" ID_Context="CRSCode" ID="1E"/>
					</ota:Source>
					<!--AirportCode填写与shopping请求一致-->
					<ota:Source AirportCode="SHA"/>
					<!--ID填写实际IATA号-->
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="13" ID_Context="IATA_Number" ID="10000035"/>
					</ota:Source>
					<!--PseudoCityCode填写与shopping请求一致-->
					<ota:Source PseudoCityCode="SHA147"/>
				</ota:POS>
				<ota:RuleReqInfo>
					<!-- DepartureDate填写方法：从shopping结果中的PriceAvailabilityBinds节点找到第1个价格对应的AvailJourneyBinding中的av编号0119，然后从编号为0119的AV信息中找到DepartureDateTime,注意Rule请求的DepartureDateTime的格式-->
					<ota:DepartureDate>2015-06-24T16:45:00</ota:DepartureDate>
					<!-- FareReference填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取FareReferce-->
					<ota:FareReference>YOWTBTQ2</ota:FareReference>
					<ota:RuleInfo>
						<ota:ResTicketingRules>
							<ota:AdvResTicketing RequestedTicketingDate="2015-06-01T10:55:38"/>
						</ota:ResTicketingRules>
					</ota:RuleInfo>
					<!-- FilingAirline填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取FilingAirline-->
					<ota:FilingAirline Code="B7"/>
					<!-- DepartureAirport 填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取DepartureAirport -->
					<ota:DepartureAirport LocationCode="TPE" CodeContext="IATA"/>
					<!-- ArrivalAirport 填写方法：从shopping结果中第一条价格对应的规则信息中获取ArrivalAirport -->
					<ota:ArrivalAirport LocationCode="NGB" CodeContext="IATA"/>
				</ota:RuleReqInfo>
			</ota:OTA_AirRulesRQ>
			<AdditionalRulesRQData IncludeResCondFltRestrictInfo="false" FareCurrencySelection="CNY" FilterByAccountCodeOnly="false" DisplayOnlyDirectionalRules="false" FootNoteDate="2015-06-24">
				<References>
					<Ref1>gepy01(user(sha,'1e',<>,y,dept(<>,<>),<>,<>,<>),pf2(y,[(agency(<>),iatanum('08610991'),n),(agency(sha147),iatanum(<>),n)],[],[],[],n,<>),<>)</Ref1>
					<Ref2>884cntbehnadty0010000100atp</Ref2>
				</References>
			</AdditionalRulesRQData>
			<TSK_Extensions>
				<ResultType>1</ResultType>
			</TSK_Extensions>
		</SITA_AirfareRulesRQ>
	</Request>
</TSK_AirfarePrice>
